docs.lead_paragraph: The Air Force on Monday fired two more nuclear commanders and disciplined a third, fresh evidence of leadership lapses in a nuclear missile corps that has suffered a rash of recent setbacks, including the firing last year of its top commander.
docs.snippet: The Air Force on Monday fired two more nuclear commanders and disciplined a third, fresh evidence of leadership lapses in a nuclear missile corps that has suffered a rash of recent setbacks, including the firing last year of its top commander.

docs.lead_paragraph: Former Adobe Chief Marketing Officer Melissa Dyrdahl hopes to bring a spa-like feel to the experience of breast cancer screenings.

headline.main: Former Adobe Exec's Start-Up Seeks to Improve the Mammogram Experience
headline.print_headline: Former Adobe Exec's Start-Up Seeks to Improve the Mammogram Experience

docs.snippet: Former Adobe Chief Marketing Officer Melissa Dyrdahl hopes to bring a spa-like feel to the experience of breast cancer screenings.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday left intact part of a controversial New York City law that forces crisis pregnancy centers to inform clients whether they have a licensed medical provider on staff.

headline.main: U.S. Top Court Leaves Intact New York City Pregnancy Center Rule
headline.print_headline: U.S. Top Court Leaves Intact New York City Pregnancy Center Rule

docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday left intact part of a controversial New York City law that forces crisis pregnancy centers to inform clients whether they have a licensed medical provider on staff.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court is leaving in place a portion of a New York City law aimed at regulating crisis pregnancy centers that are run by anti-abortion organizations.

headline.main: High Court Won't Hear Crisis Pregnancy Center Case
headline.print_headline: High Court Won't Hear Crisis Pregnancy Center Case

docs.snippet: The Supreme Court is leaving in place a portion of a New York City law aimed at regulating crisis pregnancy centers that are run by anti-abortion organizations.

docs.lead_paragraph: The same microbes can be helpful allies or dangerous threats.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by science writer Ed Yong warns that quest for healthy microbiome may be misguided; notes that research about manipulating a body's microbiome is still in its infancy; contends microbiome is complex, varied, ever changing and context-dependent, qualities that defy easy categorization.
docs.snippet: The same microbes can be helpful allies or dangerous threats.

docs.lead_paragraph: Two couples, friends, were trying to have a baby. One had the solution for both.

headline.main: It Was in Giving That They Received
headline.print_headline: It Was in Giving That They Received

docs.abstract: Ilana Kramer Modern Love column shares how her college friend and her husband, despite having their own fertility problems, helped her and her partner grow their family.
docs.snippet: Two couples, friends, were trying to have a baby. One had the solution for both.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: The Mets and their chief operating officer, in court papers filed Friday, denied accusations made in a lawsuit by a former senior ticket-sales executive who said that she had been discriminated against for being pregnant out of wedlock.

headline.main: Mets Deny Bias in Ticket Official’s Firing
headline.print_headline: Mets Deny Bias in Ticket Official’s Firing

docs.abstract: New York Mets and chief operating officer Jeff Wilpon file court documents denying accusations made in lawsuit by former executive Leigh Castergine that she had been fired because she complained about discriminatory treatment over her pregnancy to team's human resources department.
docs.snippet: The Mets and their chief operating officer, in court papers filed Friday, denied accusations made in a lawsuit by a former senior ticket-sales executive who said that she had been discriminated against for being pregnant out of wedlock.
